text: Jozef Bujňák (born 27 January 1994) is a Slovak football defender who currently plays for 2. liga club ŠK Odeva Lipany. ==Club career== ===1. FC Tatran Prešov=== Bujňák made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for 1. FC Tatran PrešovMFK Ružomberok - 1. FC TATRAN Prešov 16.07.2016, futbalnet.sk against MFK Ružomberok on 16 July 2016. ==References== ==External links== * 1.
